史蹟: (しせき) - historic landmark; historic site; historic remains
右: (migi) - () - right (direction) , right, right hand side; afore-mentioned (especialmente na escrita vertical japonesa), foregoing, forgoing, above
右から左へ: (みぎからひだりへ) - from right to left/in one ear and out the other; nice and quick/with speed and address/without further ado
右ずれ断層: (みぎずれだんそう) - dextral fault; right-lateral fault
右づめ: (みぎづめ) - right justification; aligning to the right
右といえば左: (みぎといえばひだり) - always contradicting what other people say
右と言えば左: (みぎといえばひだり) - always contradicting what other people say
右に出る: (みぎにでる) - to be superior to

右へ倣え: (みぎへならえ) - follow the person to your right (command to form a line); following someone's example/imitating someone/following suit
右へ習え: (みぎへならえ) - follow the person to your right (command to form a line); following someone's example/imitating someone/following suit

右フック: (みぎフック) - right hook (e.g. in boxing, etc.)

右回り: (みぎまわり) - clockwise rotation; CW; right-handed rotation
右図: (うず) - map on the right; chart on the right
